last_episode_to_air.name: A Terrible Vengeance
last_episode_to_air.overview: The origin of Lisa's tragic fate is revealed. Guro confronts her for the sake of his organization, seeking the knowledge required to bring forth immortality.

name: Gogol'
overview: The year 1829. Nikolay Gogol, a young Third Section clerk, is desperate: his own books seem shallow and mediocre, so he keeps buying entire print runs just to burn them all. He is suffering from violent epileptic seizures and struggles to keep on working. Investigator Yakov Guro accidentally witnesses one such fit and realizes that Gogol's visions contain clues that could help solve actual crimes. Together, Gogol and Guro take on a particularly weird and baffling case that brings them to a small village of Dikanka, where everyone has a huge secret to hide.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: The year 1829. Nikolay Gogol, a young Third Section clerk, is desperate: his own books seem shallow and mediocre, so he keeps buying entire print runs just to burn them all. He is suffering from violent epileptic seizures and struggles to keep on working. Investigator Yakov Guro accidentally witnesses one such fit and realizes that Gogol's visions contain clues that could help solve actual crimes. Together, Gogol and Guro take on a particularly weird and baffling case that brings them to a small village of Dikanka, where everyone has a huge secret to hide.

episodes.name: An Unexpected Case
episodes.overview: By chance, Detective Guro stumbles upon a case where the junior law clerk, Nikolai Gogol, is experiencing a seizure. Turns out, these experiences include powerful crime-solving visions.

episodes.name: The Otherworld
episodes.overview: As Gogol takes over the investigation, a new case arises in the midst of chaos. Oksana explains the scope of Gogol's power, but warns that his love for Lisa may stand in the way of taking full advantage.

episodes.name: The Blood Flower
episodes.overview: Gogol attempts to convince Lisa she's in danger, but her husband Alexey assures her safety. Oksana shows Gogol the origins of his power. As tensions begin to rise, Oksana pays Lisa a surprise visit.

episodes.name: The Curfew
episodes.overview: A curfew is issued in the village as more and more young girls go missing within a matter of days. Gogol begins to take control of his visionary power. A cult of animal, mask-wearing elites have brainwashed many young and innocent women.

episodes.name: The Tail of Dikanka
episodes.overview: A seasoned detective rummages through Gogol's notes. Vakula, a religious man, pleads with Gogol for his daughter, who was born with a tail. Gogol suggests to seek aid from the Doctor.

episodes.name: Viy
episodes.overview: The horseman's bloody marking begins to across the village, causing hysteria among the people. A ritual murder is carried out by a dark worshiper, who is later trapped and taken into police custody.

episodes.name: Revelation
episodes.overview: Gogol's revival only causes greater uproar in the village and the police chief accuses him of all the murders. Alexey makes an offer that Oksana cannot refuse. On the brink of death by hanging, Gogol is saved by a few unexpected heroes.

episodes.name: A Terrible Vengeance
episodes.overview: The origin of Lisa's tragic fate is revealed. Guro confronts her for the sake of his organization, seeking the knowledge required to bring forth immortality.
